sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { BsModalRef, BsModalService } from 'ngx-bootstrap/modal'; import { Subject } from 'rxjs'; import { Cliente } from 'src/app/Model/Cliente'; import { ClientesService } from 'src/app/Servico/ClienteServico/clientes.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-editclienmodal', templateUrl: './editclienmodal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./editclienmodal.component.css'], }) export class EditclienmodalComponent { modalRef!: BsModalRef; cliente = new Cliente(); Atualizado: Subject = new Subject(); constructor( private modalService: BsModalService, private edicaoClienteService: ClientesService ) {} salvarEdicaoCliente(): void { this.edicaoClienteService.alterar(this.cliente).subscribe( () => { this.Atualizado.next(); }, (error) => { console.log(this.cliente); console.error('Erro ao atualizar cliente', error); } ); } fecharModalCliente(): void { this.modalService.hide(); } } Editar Cliente

Editar Cliente
